text: It was bath time in the Kardashian - Thompson household last night and baby True was looking like the sweetest little duckling we ’ ve ever seen. Last night, Khloé Kardashian posted the cutest picture of her daughter in a bathtub to Instagram Stories. With her adorable big eyes and squeezable cheeks, we can ’ t get enough of the little one, who is set to tun two - months old this week.
